meanings.sent1: The child upgazes at the stars in wonder.
meanings.sent2: She upgazes at the tall building in amazement.
meanings.sent3: The cat upgazes at the bird on the tree.
meanings.sent4: The tree upgazes at the sky, reaching for the sun.
meanings.sent5: He upgazes at the rainbow, admiring its colors.

meanings.sent1: The hiker upgazes at the mountain peak with determination.
meanings.sent2: They upgaze at the clouds, trying to spot shapes.
meanings.sent3: The dog upgazes at the squirrel, hoping to catch it.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower upgazes at the sun, following its path.
meanings.sent5: She upgazes at the moon, dreaming of space travel.
